mapper.select: select a.QUESTION_SEQ, a.QUESTION_TITLE, b.USER_NAME AS AUTHOR_NAME, c.AUTHOR_SEQ as CATEGORY_AUTHOR_SEQ from question AS a JOIN user AS b ON a.AUTHOR_SEQ=b.USER_SEQ AND a.CATEGORY_SEQ=#{categorySeq} JOIN category as c ON a.CATEGORY_SEQ=c.CATEGORY_SEQ;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question ( QUESTION_TITLE, QUESTION_TYPE, QUESTION_ANSWER, AUTHOR_SEQ, CATEGORY_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{questionTitle}, #{questionType}, #{questionAnswer}, #{authorSeq}, #{categorySeq} )
